body_text: Now that #992 has landed, we now have a identicton_seed attribute on recipes. We should be using that instead of id. That should include the v1: prefix, and can be used for cycling shieldicons when editing and creating recipes.
body: Now that #992 has landed, we now [have a `identicton_seed` attribute on recipes](https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/pull/992/files#diff-4b47ef5bd0860f8070da44d56085d838R110). We should be using that instead of `id`. That should include the `v1:` prefix, and can be used for cycling shieldicons when editing and creating recipes.
